thread.section_title: HelloFresh US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HelloFresh US | hellofresh.com | 14 of 265
thread.title: Emily

author: Emily
title: Emily
text: Overall my experience with Hello Fresh has been great, the recipes are interesting, the ingredients are high quality, and the meals turn out great. My only complaints are: that sometimes the boxes come missing ingredients and then I have to scramble for a substitution, and a few of the recipes are a bit involved for a weeknight meal and take an hour to prepare when I am expecting no more than 30-40 minutes.
